channel.title: Projects on Jules Gazeaud

item.title: Impact Evaluation of the Comoros SSNP
item.description: In 2015, I joined a team led by Eric Mvukiyehe (DIME, The World Bank) and Olivier Sterck (Oxford University) to field a randomized control trial to assess the effects of a nation-wide social protection program. This work involves frequent, extensive field work in collaboration with two local institutions: FADC, the semi-public organisation that implements the program, and the Comorian national institute of statistics (known as INSEED), the main partner for data collection operations.
